de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.overlay
Interface KBRListener

public interface KBRListener

The Common API for Upcalls from Paper "Towards a Common API for Structured Peer-to-Peer Overlays"

Author:
Eser

Method Summary
 void deliver(OverlayKey key, Message msg)
          This function is invoked on the OverlayAgent that is the root for OverlayKey key upon the arrival of Message msg.
 void forward(OverlayKey key, Message msg, OverlayContact nextHopAgent)
          This upcall is invoked at each OverlayAgent that forwards message msg, including the source OverlayAgent, and the key’s root node (before deliver is invoked).
 void update(OverlayContact contact, boolean joined)
          This upcall is invoked to inform the application that OverlayContact contact has either joined or left the neighbor set of the local node as that set would be returned by the neighborSet call.
 

Method Detail

forward

void forward(OverlayKey key,
             Message msg,
             OverlayContact nextHopAgent)
This upcall is invoked at each OverlayAgent that forwards message msg, including the source OverlayAgent, and the key’s root node (before deliver is invoked). The upcall informs the application that message msg with OverlayKey key is about to be forwarded to nextHopAgent. The application may modify the msg, key, or nextHopNode parameters or terminate the message by setting nextHopAgent to null.

Parameters:
key -
msg -
nextHopAgent -

deliver

void deliver(OverlayKey key,
             Message msg)
This function is invoked on the OverlayAgent that is the root for OverlayKey key upon the arrival of Message msg.

Parameters:
key -
msg -

update

void update(OverlayContact contact,
            boolean joined)
This upcall is invoked to inform the application that OverlayContact contact has either joined or left the neighbor set of the local node as that set would be returned by the neighborSet call.

Parameters:
contact - info about that contact
joined - joined the network?
